attributes.action: have something done about joey barton's disgusting behaviour in the Premier League
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After Joey Barton's blatant misconduct in the recent Premier League match against Aston Villa, his behaviour towards his fellow professional Shaun Maloney was dispicable. Personally I do not wish to see such a player play in the Premier League again, Please add your name to this petition if you wish for action to be taken against Joey Barton.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
